title: Check Order Status Online
description: A customer wants to check the status of an order they placed yesterday.

tasks.description: Log into their account on the retail website.

tasks.expected_outcome: The customer sees a list of their past and current orders.

tasks.description: Click on the specific order to view its status, which is currently 'Processing'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is able to self-serve and find the current status of their order.
